analysis.key_quote: Civil service protection has been in place for generations of non-partisan workers who are devoted to serving their country. We will not be able to recruit the best, unbiased people to these roles if their job security depends on the views and whims of political factions.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong concerns about the potential for political interference in grant-making, undermining scientific integrity and merit-based evaluations, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule. It emphasizes the importance of non-partisan civil service protections and the risks of politicization, clearly indicating an opposition stance.
